alert.note: Alert for Benson; Towner (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 11:48PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Benson and southwestern Towner Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1146 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty winds to 50 mph ahead of strong thunderstorms extending from near Nanson to near Manfred. Movement was east at 40 mph. Gusty winds may occur before heavy rainfall and lightning by as much as 10 to 20 minutes. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of Benson and southwestern Towner Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
